hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.IdCliente ASC) AS Id, c.IdCliente as Campo1, (c.Nombre+' '+c.Apellido) as Campo2, c.NombreFantasia as Campo3, isnull(sum(case when tc.EsDebe = 1 then v.Total else 0 end), 0) as Campo4, isnull(sum(case when tc.EsDebe = 0 then v.Total else 0 end), 0) as Campo5, (isnull(sum(case when tc.EsDebe = 1 then v.Total else 0 end), 0) - isnull(sum(case when tc.EsDebe = 0 then v.Total else 0 end), 0)) as Campo6 from tp_DocumentosVenta v inner join tp_VentaTiposComprobante tc on v.IdTipo = tc.IdVentaTipoComprobante inner join tp_Clientes c on v.IdCliente = c.IdCliente where v.Anulado = 0 group by c.IdCliente, c.Nombre, c.Apellido, c.NombreFantasia
